body:
Do you want NBA Power Rankings from a professional sports betting model? Then you're in the right place. Far more accurate than any NBA journo or content marketing kid, these NBA Power Rankings are created by a market beating Model. You won't see it get carried away by a few good games or some lucky momentum. It's emotionless and objective. We'll update the NBA Power Rankings every week. - - - ## **NBA Player Rankings** ![NBA Player Rankings](/images/uploads/nba-player-rankings.png "NBA Player Rankings") ![NBA Player Rankings](/images/uploads/nba-player-rankings-2.png "NBA Player Rankings") ![NBA Player Rankings](/images/uploads/nba-player-rankings-3.png "NBA Player Rankings") ![NBA Player Rankings](/images/uploads/nba-player-rankings-4.png "NBA Player Rankings") ![NBA Player Rankings](/images/uploads/nba-player-rankings-5.png "NBA Player Rankings") What does the Rating mean? The LA Lakers at 6.88 means the Lakers are 6.88 points better than average. Cleveland -6.57 means 6.57 worse than average. The number doesn't include home ground advantage either. So Lakers vs Cavs at Staples is going to create a monster line on our **[NBA Predictions Model](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-predictions)**. - - - ## **Want more insight? Join the weekly email.** ## **We promise it's worth your time.** ## **
** - - - ## **More NBA Resources** We LOVE betting futures.
